m_szDocTitle: Model 3 A Game Changer For Tesla In Asia - Tesla Motors (NASDAQ:TSLA) | Seeking Alpha
m_szDocSumamry: Model 3 A Game Changer For Tesla In Asia Apr.  5, 2016  2:02 PM ET | Summary Model 3 Gives Tesla new opportunities in the high population and lower income countries of Asia. Model 3 Could lead to huge knock-on opportunities for Tesla in China and India. It is not just about how many Model 3's the company can sell. Pre-orders apparently buoyant around the region. Instant impact of the Model 3 by each country. Upon its launch Elon Musk had tweeted that the Model 3 would enable Tesla (NASDAQ: TSLA ) to penetrate markets outside of North America and Europe. Countries he cited included Brazil and I
